title: Science Education and Environmental Awareness Enhancement Program Through Mobile Outdoor Collaborative Inquiry

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic scientific terminology, general awareness of environmental issues, digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Pre-service/in-service teachers practice science education methodologies, simulating outdoor inquiry activities online using mobile devices.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the process of scientifically analyzing socio-environmental issues in specific regions
Learners can make evidence-based decisions about environmental issues based on data collected using mobile technology
Learners can write reports explaining the causal relationships of environmental phenomena using scientific terminology.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
